name: Misk Schools Quest
description:
To play this game on PS5, your system may need to be updated to the latest system software. Although this game is playable on PS5, some features available on PS4 may be absent. See PlayStation.com/bc for more details.
In the year 3020, earth became so polluted that humans built floating cities above the clouds and filled them with service robots to take care of most aspects of life. But now, those robots turned against civilians due to a mysterious virus and as Elite Robot Officer Misk 802 your mission is to cure the robots to save the city of Alpha Cloud.

• Explore a unique futuristic setting.
• Travel between different sectors in the city of Alpha Cloud on your hoverbike.
• Use your healing laser to re-program the robots and prevent them from attacking civilians.
• Venture through 10 unique environments across the city of Alpha Cloud spanning warehouses, laboratories, Factories and Research Labs.
• An atmospheric soundtrack

This game is co-developed in collaboration with the students of Misk Schools (Grades 4 to 6).

Powered by vGame - Semaphore's Game Development Platform


Offline single player
Enhanced game play on PS4 Pro console


Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).

One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
